scripts.start: if [ ! -z "${BOT_TOKEN}" ]; then node ./src/index.js; else echo "For production usage please add the .env file to the app service in your docker-compose.yml. (https://docs.docker.com/compose/environment-variables/#the-env_file-configuration-option)"; fi
scripts.env: if [ "${NODE_ENV}" = "production" ]; then npm run start --production; else npm run dev; fi
